title: SSCN Launches Annual Mentorship Program
author: Student Affairs Office
summary: The new mentorship program pairs final-year students with incoming first-years to provide guidance, support, and a friendly face on campus.
content:
In a move to foster a stronger, more supportive student community, the Student Affairs Office has officially launched the annual SSCN Mentorship Program. This initiative pairs experienced final-year students with new, incoming students to help them navigate the challenges and opportunities of their academic journey.

Mentors will provide academic guidance, share practical tips for clinical placements, and offer personal support to help first-years acclimate to campus life. We believe this program will not only improve academic outcomes but also build lasting professional relationships.

title: SSCN Hosts Annual Community Health Fair
author: Jane Doe
summary: Our annual health fair was a massive success, providing free check-ups and health education to over 500 members of the Soroti community...
content:
Our annual health fair was a massive success, providing free check-ups and health education to over 500 members of the Soroti community. The event, held on the main campus grounds, featured stations for blood pressure screening, nutritional counseling, and vaccination drives.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all the student volunteers and faculty members who dedicated their time and expertise. This event underscores our commitment to community well-being, a core value we instill in all our students.

title: New Simulation Lab Unveiled
author: Admin
summary: We are thrilled to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art clinical simulation laboratory, designed to give students hands-on experience...
content: We are thrilled to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art clinical simulation laboratory. This facility is equipped with high-fidelity manikins and real-world medical equipment, allowing students to practice critical skills in a safe, controlled environment before entering clinical placements.

title: Welcome to the New Academic Year
author: Admin
summary: A warm welcome to all new and returning students for the 2025 academic year. We are excited for a year of learning, growth, and excellence.
content: A warm welcome to all new and returning students for the 2025 academic year. We are excited for a year of learning, growth, and excellence. This year, we are introducing several new student support initiatives and look forward to seeing you all on campus.
